title: Championship Round preview with MJD & Veep's Matt Walsh
itunes:title: Championship Round preview with MJD & Veep's Matt Walsh
description:
Dave Dameshek leaves Studio 66 to meet up with Maurice Jones-Drew to talk all things AFC & NFC Championship. The guys start off previewing the Rams vs Saints game as Maurice says why the team he does radio analysis for will win (3:25). Then, they transition to the AFC side as MJD explains why he believes the Chiefs will win at home in the title game (16:30). Next, as always Shek has to bring up the Steelers so he makes Maurice predict where Antonio Brown and Le'Veon Bell will play in 2019 as well as picking who wins the AFC North next season (41:23). Then, actor Matt Walsh visits Studio 66 to chat about his Chicago Bears, his new movie Under The Eiffel Tower and the final season of Veep (45:53).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
